description: I have several VMs with vm_state='error' and task_state='deleting'.  Attempting to delete these vms results in a VDMVolumeNotFoundError and the vms never completely get deleted.  I would think that the if the volume is missing for some reason, the remainder of the deletion process should simply complete.  This is occurring in the current code from trunk.
title: VMs in error, deleting state can never be deleted

comments.content: I have several VMs with vm_state='error' and task_state='deleting'.  Attempting to delete these vms results in a VDMVolumeNotFoundError and the vms never completely get deleted.  I would think that the if the volume is missing for some reason, the remainder of the deletion process should simply complete.  This is occurring in the current code from trunk.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ed-bak2

comments.content: After some further investigation, this bug isn't valid. I don't see a way to delete it or close it.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ed-bak2
